summary: In a rural school in the middle of the mountains, a girl who is starting to become a woman feels the profound need to discover her true identity. She does not know who her father is and she... See full summary »
cast: Paula Galinelli Hertzog|Paola Barrientos|Alvin Astorga|Sergio Boris|Arturo Goetz|Eugenia Alonso|Vanessa Weinberg|Santiago Luna
title: Ciencias naturales
